reference:
badhealth is saved as a data frame.
Count models use numvisit as the response variable, 0 counts are included.
title: badhealth
description:
Description
From German health survey data for the year 1998 only.

parameters.numvisit: number of visits to doctor during 1998
parameters.badh: 1=patient claims to be in bad health; 0=not in bad health

format: A data frame with 1,127 observations on the following 3 variables.
